thread.title: Review: Latest Swine Palace play 'goes there’ with the tough questions surrounding American man with Muslim heritage
thread.title_full: Review: Latest Swine Palace play 'goes there’ with the tough questions surrounding American man with Muslim heritage

title: Review: Latest Swine Palace play 'goes there’ with the tough questions surrounding American man with Muslim heritage
text: Oct 8, 2015 17:50 Review: Latest Swine Palace play 'goes there’ with the tough questions surrounding American man with Muslim heritage Review: Latest Swine Palace play 'goes there’ with the tough questions surrounding American man with Muslim heritage Photo provided by Swine Palace -- Zarif Kabier, left, plays the first generation Pakistani-American Amir, who is trying to escape his Muslim background, and Cara Reid plays his artist wife Emily, who embraces his culture through her work, in Swine Palace's production of the drama, 'Disgraced.' george morris | gmorris@theadvocate.com
